name: PUTTIUM
description:
--PUTTIUM(パテウム)

This is a three-minute puzzle.
As the cursor passes over a panel, it changes color.
Match the colors vertically or horizontally to erase them within the time limit.

---
※Japanese is converted by deepl.
Grammar may be wrong.
---

◆Controls
Decision: Z key 
Back: X key
Cursor movement: Directional keys
(The cursor cannot be backtracked.)

◆Rules, advice
It is a three-minute time attack.
When the cursor passes over a panel, the panel changes color.
When the colors are aligned vertically or horizontally, the row is fixed and disappears after about eight beats.
The trick is to increase the number of rows of the same color by using it well, since the fixed rows do not change color.

◇Other specifications
The next skin is branched by the color you erased, etc.
If you select a skin directly from the menu It is the same skin all the time.
Sometimes there is a sound out-of-sync, but the synchronization will be improved after a while.
(Sorry if it does not work correctly.)
